name: 4 Classes, Many Paths
detailed_description:
You wake in an Empty Lab.
On your tube is a Note:
"Do not Wake him.!!"

You lay on a bed, inside a glass tube, You see a note, on the outside of the glass tube. You hear your heart beat, and You feel the bed, you are laying on.

You see an empty lab outside the tube, and you hear an electronic fan, slowing down. The Air inside the glass tube feels cold.

There is a handle on the inside of the tube. You take hold of it, and You hear the sound as the tube starts to swing up.

You Have to buy this game, if You like killing Zombies.
You Have to buy this game, if You like to explore Unique Games.
You Have to buy this game, if You want to play Different Classes.

You are alone in the World.


A Zombie plague hit Earth.
The Scientist found that Cold Sleep killed the virus.
They tested it on you, later You wake, Alone in the world.

The World is filled with zombies, but the zombies need heat of the Sun to move.
Night is the time, where You can move, explore, and scavenge for supplies...

Maybe there are more people alive, in the colder regions, and in other Cold Sleep facilities.

Your longtime memory was damage in the Cold sleep, so You can start a new live.



Choose between 4 Classes.
The Gunman, A simple fighter with more weapons than brain.

The Builder, A worker, with a big Hammer, and the ability to build walls and defenses.

The Beast-Master, A mad scientist that controls animals with his mental power.

The Necromancer, A Dark Wizard, that can drink undeads energy and use them to create minions.

At level 10, You can change class, or specialize in your own class.
There is 24 different combinations of classes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: +2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Yes
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
